summary: Completed comprehensive testing of P2 Admin Features for WAConnect SaaS platform. All features working correctly: Dynamic product attributes (veg/non-veg for food, sizes/colors for clothing), Business settings (delivery charges, taxes, color scheme). Backend 100% passing (12/12 tests). Frontend fully functional.
passed_tests: Products page shows veg/non-veg indicator (green border) for food products
Products page shows size tags (S, M, L, XL) for clothing products
Products page shows color tags (Black, White, Blue) for clothing products
Add/Edit Product dialog shows veg/non-veg toggle when product type is 'food'
Add/Edit Product dialog shows veg/non-veg toggle when product type is 'grocery'
Add/Edit Product dialog shows sizes selection (XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL) when product type is 'clothing'
Add/Edit Product dialog shows colors selection (Red, Blue, Green, Black, White, Yellow) when product type is 'clothing'
Business Settings page has Delivery & Charges section with delivery charges input
Business Settings page has Delivery & Charges section with free delivery threshold input
Business Settings page has Tax Settings section with tax percentage field
Business Settings page has Color Scheme section with 8 preset colors
Business Settings page has Color Scheme section with custom color pickers (Primary, Secondary, Accent)
Business Settings page has Color Scheme preview with 3 color bars
Color scheme changes are saved successfully (toast confirmation)
Color scheme changes are reflected in public API endpoint
Customer site displays products with size tags
critical_code_review_comments: ESLint warnings for missing useEffect dependencies in BusinessSettings.jsx and ProductsPageEnhanced.jsx - not critical but should be addressed for code quality
seed_data_creation: Used existing test data: Business 'Demo Fashion Store' (subdomain: demofashion) with products 'Classic T-Shirt' (clothing with sizes/colors) and 'Paneer Butter Masala' (food with is_veg=true)
context_for_next_testing_agent: P2 Admin Features verified working: 1) Dynamic product attributes - veg/non-veg toggle for food/grocery products, sizes/colors selection for clothing products. 2) Business settings - delivery charges (₹50), free delivery threshold (₹500), tax percentage (18%), color scheme with 8 presets and custom pickers. Test business: demofashion with green color scheme (#16a34a). Backend test file at /app/backend/tests/test_p2_admin_features.py covers all P2 API endpoints.

details.veg_non_veg_toggle: Appears for food and grocery product types with Vegetarian/Non-Vegetarian radio options
details.sizes_selection: Appears for clothing products with preset sizes (XS, S, M, L, XL, XXL) and custom size input
details.colors_selection: Appears for clothing products with preset colors (Red, Blue, Green, Black, White, Yellow) and custom color input
details.product_cards: Display veg indicator (green border), size tags, and color tags correctly

details.delivery_charges: Input field with ₹ symbol and helper text 'Amount charged for delivery'
details.free_delivery_threshold: Input field with ₹ symbol and helper text 'Minimum order for free delivery'
details.tax_percentage: Input field with % symbol and helper text 'GST or other applicable taxes'
details.color_scheme: 8 preset color buttons, 3 custom color pickers (Primary, Secondary, Accent), Preview section with 3 color bars

color_scheme_persistence.details: Color scheme saved to database and returned via public API endpoint. Green theme (#16a34a) applied to customer site.
